A Tiny shape of flame appears, taking a form of your choiceâ€”such as a bird, an arrow, or a simple sphere. It Flies from you up to 30 feet in a path you choose. Each creature it passes through takes @Damage[(floor((@actor.level -1)/2)+1)d6[fire]] damage with a @Check[type:reflex|dc:resolve(@actor.system.proficiencies.classDCs.kineticist.dc)|basic:true] save against your class DC. A creature attempts only one save, even if the flame passes through it multiple times.

Level (+2) The damage increases by 1d6.
